isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 MODEL - CUMMINS M11E AND N14E ENGINES - OPERATION

svcproc.title: ECM POWER CIRCUITS
svcproc.para: The ECM is grounded through the Cummins harness, ECM power harness connector (310) and circuit 97-G to the engine ground stud. The engine ground stud is connected to the cranking motor ground stud, frame rail and negative battery terminal.

Turning the key switch to the ignition or start position energizes the ignition relay. The relay then applies power to circuits 16A and 16E, 15A circuit breaker B3, and circuit 16D to the 21-way ECM connector (309).
